title: Bug Zac's E
body:
Following the last patch , I immediately noticed a problem with the indicator of the range of Zac's E.
It does not appear the maximum range of skill while you are charging it, which is very inconvenient because you have to calculate , in a short time , the movements of the enemies and then decide the place in which use your skill.
Before patch 6.1 was possible to see the maximum range even when loading, but now you see only the effective range of the launch ( equivalent to how much the skill is loaded )


There is a post in EUW too: http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en/wyPxLV4z-zac-new-range-indicator-issues

replies.body: Yeah, sorry about that. I broke it in a recent overhaul to how we represent targeter data, and didn't get my fix in in time for this patch. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

I'm glad to see that you're aware of the bug. There is also another E bug which I think most zac mains have been aware of for awhile. Occasionally his E will start charging in the opposite direction of your cursor. When this first happened to me I thought that I must have hit the map or something, but it happened again so I looked it up and lots of people have had the same issue. I've met people in-game as well that have had this issue. I can't personally record it because my computer barely runs league of legends as it is, my frames would drop too much with recording software but you can see it at about 2:01 in this darkk mane video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9aiUJmi6BU

While this doesn't happen very often, it's EXTREMELY frustrating when you're about to help bot lane and then your E goes in the wrong direction so you have to cancel it and since it's now on cool down you have to walk into the fight then your team flames at you for not helping...

OMG I always thought: wth, did i just missclick or somewhere in the minimap? and it's awful because i missed so many opportunities to jump in while charing in the opposite site. then u have to cancel. then u have half cooldown on it... and the tf already is over or the enemy Team is Aware that u're here. or the tf Begins because they think u jump over but instead, u won't jump and your Team is dying and they're flaming u like: why didn't u jump in?
at first, i thought it's because i missclicked or something like that... but it happened now a few time... i don't know if i am the one who Failed, or it's really buged.
Any chance this could be fixed this patch or no? This is like playing Xerath but without an indicator on his ult range. It's very hard to play this champion correctly with this bug.

This gameplay breaking for all Zac players. Hotfix it or at least post a notice that it's bugged in the client.

It's infuriating to log in a game to discover this bug that Riot is aware of but didn't inform players.

Can Riot please hotfix this? im one trick Zac, i made my first game at patch 6.1 today and i feel so bad for this bug.

Thank you.
